comment._content: I needed somthing that was just Arizona and this photo was perfect. Thank you for making it availalbe. I used it on a post about buying property in Arizona. activerain.com/blogsview/2183002/snowbirds-in-arizona-sho...

comment._content:
Hi ValerieZinger,

We're glad you found a photo in our collection that suited your needs!  We do appreciate when credit is given to the U.S. National Archives when our photo is used in your blog.

Thanks!

Mary
U.S. National Archives
